message.content:
cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.SY, cs.CE, cs.CR

The paper discusses the development of new information and communication systems to promote social self-organization, self-regulation, well-being, sustainability, and resilience. This involves mining large datasets and developing new methods and tools, which falls under the category of computational science (cs.CY). The paper also mentions the creation of a Planetary Nervous System (PNS) and a Living Earth Simulator (LES), which are both related to simulation and modeling (cs.SI). The aim of the approach is to increase individual opportunities for social, economic and political participation, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY) and computational engineering, finance, and science (cs.CE). Finally, the paper discusses the need for collective awareness of the impact of human actions on the world, which is related to cryptography and security (cs.CR).
